item.title: Government shutdown will have lasting effects on National Guard, advocates say
item.description: As the government shutdown stretches on, military advocates are warning of long-lasting effects to National Guard troops and their readiness

item.title: Families accuse Camp Mystic of ignoring risks in Texas lawsuit over flood deaths
item.description: The families of some of the 25 girls and two teenage counselors who died in catastrophic flooding in Texas on July 4 are suing Camp Mystic and its own...

item.title: WWII nurses who dodged bullets deserve Congressional honor, lawmakers say
item.description: A coalition of retired military nurses and others is pushing to award the Congressional Gold Medal to World War II nurses

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 06-28-44-48-58, Powerball: 23

item.title: New Mexico Legislature approves bill to backfill food assistance if SNAP aid falters
item.description: New Mexico has enacted legislation to support food assistance with state funding each week if SNAP federal food aid falters
